title: I got less marks in 12th how will it affect my overall percentage? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you got less marks in your subjects, than definitely it would affect your overalll percentage.. But dont worry, if you are not satisfied then you can give improvement exams for 12th.. And at last, we know that marks are important and 12th Boards play an important role in a students life, but most important thing is getting your skills and brushing it up for your career.. 12th marks, are definitely important for your first job, later its your work and experience which plays an important role, in shaping your career... Thanks Do UPVOTE
